TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalizabilityAttribute extends System.Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Field, AllowMultiple=false, Inherited=true)

Docs.summary: Specifies the localization attributes for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] class or class member.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This attribute can be applied to a class, property, or method.
For more information on how to use localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory category) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified localization category.
Gets the category setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
Docs.value: The category setting of the localization attribute.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute.
|Category setting|Meaning| |----------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Resource does not belong to a standard category.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A lengthy piece of descriptive text.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A single line of text, such as a title.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A short text string, such as a control label.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> or other panel that can contain text.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Font-related data such as font family, font style, or font size.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Inherits category from parent node.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource. This does not apply to any child nodes of the resource.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource, or any of its child nodes whose category is set to <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>.|
## Examples The following code example shows the category settings of localization attributes defined for a button.
[!code-xml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet1](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/AttributesSnippets/Attributes.xaml#attributessnippet1)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the modifiability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
Docs.value: The modifiability setting of the localization attribute.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute.
|Modifiability setting|Meaning| |---------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value is modifiable by localizers.| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value is not modifiable by localizers.| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value's modifiability is inherited from its parent node.|
## Examples The following code example shows the modifiability setting of localization attributes defined for a button.
[!code-xml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet1](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/AttributesSnippets/Attributes.xaml#attributessnippet1)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the readability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
Docs.value: The readability setting of the localization attribute.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows the readability settings of the localization attribute.
|Readability setting|Meaning| |-------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value is readable text.| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value is not readable.| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value's readability is inherited from its parent node.|
## Examples The following code example shows the readability setting of localization attributes defined for a text block.
[!code-xml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet4](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/AttributesSnippets/Comments.xaml#attributessnippet4)]
